casebody.data:
HOLMAN v. THOMAS et al. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 17, 1910.) No. 168. In Error to the Circuit Court of the United States for the Western District of New York. On motion by attorney for defendants to withdraw. See, also, 171 Fed. 219.

Before LACOMBE, WARD, and NOYES, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

This court must decline to interfere in any way with the relations between defendants’ counsel and his clients. Whether he shall con- - tinue to act for them or shall withdraw from the case is a matter for him to determine at his own risk.
